snippet: Paris St.-Germain broke the transfer record in the French league by signing the Uruguay striker Edinson Cavani to a five-year contract for a reported transfer fee of $84 million.
abstract: Paris St.-Germain breaks transfer record in French league by signing Uruguay striker Edinson Cavani to five-year contract for reported transfer fee of $84 million; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Paris St.-Germain broke the transfer record in the French league by signing the Uruguay striker Edinson Cavani to a five-year contract for a reported transfer fee of $84 million.

headline.main: Uruguay Striker Cavani Moves to Paris
